name: Harold & The Washing Machine
description:
Harold returns home from a long day of adventuring, only to find that his washing machine has gone mad! Help Harold fight take back his house and calm down his washing machine!

First game I ever made. Feel free to leave feedback! (And report any issues you may have!)

I have not tested the Mac and Linux builds, but if there's an issue, feel free to let me know!

Project made for Harold's Last Stand Jam.
